subject: Negotiation
title: Online Reputation as Leverage
description: A short lesson to help you apply Online Reputation as Leverage.

hook.text: One viral negative review can cost a restaurant 30% of its revenue. Online reputation is real currency.

buildup.text: In the digital age, reputation travels faster and farther than ever before.

discovery.text: 93% of consumers read online reviews before buying. Your reputation precedes every negotiation.

twist.text: Some negotiators use the threat of negative reviews as leverage â€” a modern form of pressure.

climax.text: Build and protect your online reputation. It negotiates for you before you enter any room.

punchline.text: Your reputation arrives before you do. Make sure it says the right things.

quiz.question: Why is online reputation important for negotiation?
options: It precedes you and influences the other side before you even meet
